name: v0.8.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_lint", version = "0.8.0")

# Next, follow the install instructions for
# - linting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.8.0/docs/linting.md
# - formatting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.8.0/docs/formatting.md
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_lint",
    sha256 = "7a8bdea379953332aa6ea48919baa1bd8971c72b06ec0fd22e8c5465884dbdcb",
    strip_prefix = "rules_lint-0.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/releases/download/v0.8.0/rules_lint-v0.8.0.tar.gz",
)

# Use whichever formatter binaries you need:
load(
    "@aspect_rules_lint//format:repositories.bzl",
    "fetch_java_format",
    "fetch_jsonnet",
    "fetch_ktfmt",
    "fetch_pmd",
    "fetch_shfmt",
    "fetch_swiftformat",
    "fetch_terraform",
)

fetch_pmd()

fetch_jsonnet()

fetch_terraform()

fetch_java_format()

fetch_ktfmt()

fetch_shfmt()

fetch_swiftformat()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:ruff.bzl", "fetch_ruff")

fetch_ruff()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:shellcheck.bzl", "fetch_shellcheck")

fetch_shellcheck()
```


## What's Changed
* docs: explain which production of ts_project to lint by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/76
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/83
* Fix ruff by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/84
* chore: explain why we don't add mypy here by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/85
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/87
* Exclude deleted files and include untracked ones from format by @psalaberria002 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/89
* feat: generate a patch file with linter fixes by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/62
* Add ruff aspect to py_test by @psalaberria002 in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/93
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/92
* Ruff Windows Support by @LaurenceTews in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/91

## New Contributors
* @psalaberria002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/89
* @dzbarsky made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/62
* @LaurenceTews made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/91

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

name: v0.7.0
body:
ðŸ”´ BREAKING CHANGE:

eslint_aspect `config` is now named `configs` and can accept a list as well as a string.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_lint", version = "0.7.0")

# Next, follow the install instructions for
# - linting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.7.0/docs/linting.md
# - formatting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.7.0/docs/formatting.md
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_lint",
    sha256 = "6e32df708b40ea8c6d4482eeaf8fd6afaa8798d0028654ba25b667b5aee5707c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_lint-0.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/releases/download/v0.7.0/rules_lint-v0.7.0.tar.gz",
)

# Use whichever formatter binaries you need:
load(
    "@aspect_rules_lint//format:repositories.bzl",
    "fetch_java_format",
    "fetch_jsonnet",
    "fetch_ktfmt",
    "fetch_pmd",
    "fetch_shfmt",
    "fetch_swiftformat",
    "fetch_terraform",
)

fetch_pmd()

fetch_jsonnet()

fetch_terraform()

fetch_java_format()

fetch_ktfmt()

fetch_shfmt()

fetch_swiftformat()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:ruff.bzl", "fetch_ruff")

fetch_ruff()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:shellcheck.bzl", "fetch_shellcheck")

fetch_shellcheck()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: Respect exclude when formatting with ruff by @jsharpe in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/70
* refactor: reduce duplication in formatter lang:tool mapping by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/68
* chore: change maintainer to individual rather than team. by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/71
* feat: allow multiple eslint configs in one aspect definition by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/72
* Give up on upstream by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/73
* fix(eslint): declare copy_to_bin toolchains for bazel-lib 2.0 compat by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/75

## New Contributors
* @jsharpe made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/70

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_lint", version = "0.6.1")

# Next, follow the install instructions for
# - linting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.6.1/docs/linting.md
# - formatting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.6.1/docs/formatting.md
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_lint",
    sha256 = "604666ec7ffd4f5f2636001ae892a0fbc29c77401bb33dd10601504e3ba6e9a7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_lint-0.6.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/releases/download/v0.6.1/rules_lint-v0.6.1.tar.gz",
)

# Use whichever formatter binaries you need:
load(
    "@aspect_rules_lint//format:repositories.bzl",
    "fetch_java_format",
    "fetch_jsonnet",
    "fetch_ktfmt",
    "fetch_pmd",
    "fetch_shfmt",
    "fetch_swiftformat",
    "fetch_terraform",
)

fetch_pmd()

fetch_jsonnet()

fetch_terraform()

fetch_java_format()

fetch_ktfmt()

fetch_shfmt()

fetch_swiftformat()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:ruff.bzl", "fetch_ruff")

fetch_ruff()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:shellcheck.bzl", "fetch_shellcheck")

fetch_shellcheck()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: only present reports from the current bazel run by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/61
* fix: in use_exit_code mode, print reports to stdio by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/63
* ci: add integration testing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/64
* chore: wire up protobuf formatter by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/67
* fix: workaround Bazel extract bug by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/66
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/69
* fix: don't eslint on js_binary, it has no srcs by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/65


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

## What's Changed
* chore: fix bcr publishing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/43
* fix: allow multiple lint_test targets in the same package by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/44
* fix: template the fix target string in failure error message by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/48
* feat: auto-mirror ruff releases by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/49
* chore: add scalafmt back again by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/47
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/50
* style: recommend format as an alias in root BUILD by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/51
* Changes by create-pull-request action by @github-actions in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/56
* feat: split javascript and sql formatter options by @ewhauser in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/59
* feat: allow multiple ruff config files by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/60

## New Contributors
* @mattem made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/48
* @github-actions made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/50
* @ewhauser made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/59

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_lint", version = "0.5.0")

# Next, follow the install instructions for
# - linting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.5.0/docs/linting.md
# - formatting: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/blob/v0.5.0/docs/formatting.md
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_lint",
    sha256 = "ddc21b1399c03708f82e5a46d6c747bf23d55484bad1efdaa92a22d5fee20ea1",
    strip_prefix = "rules_lint-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_lint-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

# Use whichever formatter binaries you need:
load(
    "@aspect_rules_lint//format:repositories.bzl",
    "fetch_java_format",
    "fetch_jsonnet",
    "fetch_ktfmt",
    "fetch_pmd",
    "fetch_shfmt",
    "fetch_swiftformat",
    "fetch_terraform",
)

fetch_pmd()

fetch_jsonnet()

fetch_terraform()

fetch_java_format()

fetch_ktfmt()

fetch_shfmt()

fetch_swiftformat()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:ruff.bzl", "fetch_ruff")

fetch_ruff()

load("@aspect_rules_lint//lint:shellcheck.bzl", "fetch_shellcheck")

fetch_shellcheck()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: exclude example from release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/30
* chore: fix eslint absolute paths by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/31
* Add lint aspect for Ruff by @tokongs in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/16
* feat: add shellcheck by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/32
* Replace Black with Ruff as the Python formatter by @mortenmj in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/33
* fix: include tool mnemonic in report filenames by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/35
* Replace prettier-plugin-sh with shfmt by @mortenmj in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/34
* fix: allow ruff binary to be a source file by @plobsing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/37
* fix: make lint tools visible to all subpackages of example repo by @plobsing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/38
* chore: reference latest aspect CLI version from .bazeliskrc by @plobsing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/36
* docs: recommend check-mode for fallback pre-commit hook by @plobsing in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/39
* feat: check srcs of *_binary targets in lint aspect walks by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/41

## New Contributors
* @tokongs made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/16
* @mortenmj made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/33
* @plobsing made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/pull/37

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_lint/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0
